name: Badge
description: 图标右上角的圆形徽标数字，一般出现在通知图标或头像的右上角，用于显示需要处理的消息条数，通过醒目视觉形式吸引用户处理

props.name: count
props.description: 展示的数字，大于 overflowCount 时显示 ${overflowCount}+，为 0 时隐藏

props.name: dot
props.description: 小点模式，开启后不展示数字

props.name: showZero
props.description: 当数值为 0 时，是否展示 Badge

props.name: text
props.description: 状态点文本，仅在配置了 status 属性后生效

props.name: size
props.description: 尺寸，仅在非 dot 模式下生效，支持 small 和 default 两种尺寸

examples.title: Basic
examples.description: The basic badge display, the badge is not displayed by default when `count` is 0. You can modify it to display by configuring `showZero`

examples.title: No children
examples.description: Independent use, no wrapping elements is independent use, you can customize the style

examples.title: Overflow count
examples.description: Set the `overflowCount` property, when the number is greater than this value, display $\{overflowCount\}+

examples.title: Size
examples.description: Set the `size` property to `small` to display a small badge. The supported sizes are `small` and `default`.

examples.title: Dot
examples.description: Open `dot` dot mode, do not display numbers

examples.description: The basic badge display, the badge is not displayed by default when `count` is 0. You can modify it to display by configuring `showZero`
